id: ID of the conversation in the original dataset
topic: Phrase describing the topic of the conversation

turns.id: ID of the turn in the original dataset
turns.utterance: Text that was sent by user (markdown)
turns.response: Text that was sent by the system in response to utterance (markdown)

rewritten_utterance.source: Name of the method used to rewrite the text, or 'human' if some human rewrote it
rewritten_utterance.text: The utterance (see above) rewritten to make it less context dependent

turns.topic: Phrase describing the topic of the turn

provenance.id: ID of the text in the dataset
provenance.dataset: Name of the dataset of the text
provenance.text: The text used to create the response (among others)
provenance.title: The title of the text
